description: Application for non-material amendment for changes to first floor side extension in terms of setback of planning permission PP/2014/4321 dated 17/10/2014 for two storey and single storey rear and side extensions (following the demolition of garage and existing ground utility addition); Rear roof extension (associated with the conversion of roof space to habitable use), installation of one rooflight to front roof slope and one rooflight to rear roofslope and construction of basement beneath rear extension. Amendments to provide for rectification of an inconsistency in the approved plans East side elevation; setting back of the two storey side extension form the front elevation; setting back of the single storey side extension from the front elevation; reducing height of the single storey side extension and  a part replacment of the pitched roof to a flat roof; the removal of one of the three approved roof lights; reduction in scale of the rear dormer.
